metadata.titel_preek: A Christian Word For Tough Times

kernfrasen: under the command of One who has never lost a battle
the way is not always going to be smooth
opened a pathway in the sea
rockets of sickness and fever and chills

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: God's chosen people ought not to be God's frozen people.

cognitieve_implicaties: Spiritual health is felt as warmth and seen as movement.
theologische_implicaties: The Holy Spirit is essentially kinetic and thermal.
ethische_implicaties: Emotional restraint in worship is a sign of spiritual death.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Introverted or quiet faith is viewed as 'frozen' or invalid.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'cold' metaphor by contrasting it with the 'fire on the altar' and the physical 'shaking' of the Spirit.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher maintains a tight military framework throughout, using the 'Soldier' metaphor as the primary lens to interpret both personal suffering and systemic injustice.

incoherentie_punten.locatie: The description of the 'Gospel of Peace'
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher uses military equipment (shoes) to carry 'peace'.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: Soldiers typically march to war, not to establish peace through non-violence.

succesvolle_blending.locatie: The description of the enemy's weapons
succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher weaponizes nature, describing sickness and floods as 'missiles' and 'rockets' launched by spiritual powers.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Soldier' metaphor by grounding it in the historical reality of Roman roads and West Point graduates.
sterktes.voorbeeld: There is a soldier in our family, a West Point graduate...

risicos.beschrijving: The heavy use of military imagery can inadvertently sanctify violence or a combative posture toward the world.
risicos.voorbeeld: Our Commander tamed the stubbornness of a pharaoh... brought a giant crashing to earth.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may adopt a triumphalist or aggressive stance toward 'enemies'.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A cosmic battlefield where 'tough times' are tactical assaults from spiritual rulers.

deictic_shifts.locatie: Transition to the MLK Jr. section
deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Powerful; it bridges the 'Soldier' metaphor into modern civil rights struggle.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By emphasizing God's undefeated record and absolute authority over 'cases' (legal/historical).

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Juxtaposing the 'exuberance' of Smith College with the 'grim reality' of death and sickness.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the 'Church Militant' tradition.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by a MILITARY landscape that successfully transforms passive suffering into active 'endurance.' It moves from the personal (weeping student) to the cosmic (Revelation) using the 'Commander' schema to provide security.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Slightly conventional ('fire goes out on the altar').
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'fire' to the 'missiles' of the enemyâ€”God's fire as a defensive heat.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Holy Spirit is the thermal shield against the chill of the grave.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The shift from 'Soldier' to 'Wrestler' and 'Builder' is brief.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Focus exclusively on the Soldier metaphor to avoid 'metaphor fatigue' in the middle section.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If God is a Commander who 'never lost a battle,' why do soldiers (believers) suffer 'missiles of disease'?
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify that the Commander shares the 'shock of sin' (Incarnational military leadership).

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: The preacher already touches on 'closing the case' regarding MLK; expanding this would strengthen the 'God as Just Judge' theme.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using a single dominant conceptual metaphor (MILITARY) to provide a cognitive map for navigating diverse forms of human suffering.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'frozen people' alliteration, CMT reveals it as a cognitive shift in how the hearer perceives spiritual stasis.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's experiential learning cycles, CMT shows how the preacher uses the 'Soldier' schema to pre-structure the hearer's experience of future 'tough times'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher isn't just using 'war' as a theme, but is mapping the logic of military hierarchy onto the believer's relationship with God to produce 'obedience' and 'enthusiasm'.

appendices.notities: The sermon effectively uses 'Text World Theory' to transport the audience from a New England college to a cosmic battlefield.
